curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Mattresses and box springs must be completely wrapped and sealed in plastic prior to collection.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place items at the curb by 6:30 a.m. on your appointment day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Each item must be small enough for two people to lift safely and not exceed 150 pounds. Items may not exceed 8 feet in length or 4 feet in width. Customers may place up to two cubic yards of heavy trash at the curb.

drop_off_locations.name: Texas Disposal Systems Landfill
drop_off_locations.notes: Mattresses accepted. Call facility for current rates and requirements.

drop_off_locations.name: Austin Community Landfill (Waste Management)
drop_off_locations.notes: Mattresses, couches & furniture accepted. Call facility for current rates and requirements.

contacts.department_name: New York City Department of Sanitation

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: You must enclose mattresses and box springs in a sealed plastic bag to protect DSNY workers from bed bugs. Mattresses and box springs that are not in bags will not be collected.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place items out for collection after 4 PM the day before your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: No specific size or weight limits mentioned for mattresses beyond general bulk item guidelines.

illegal_dumping.fine_amount: Not less than $400 nor more than $4,000 for a first offense
illegal_dumping.citation: Rules of the City of New York Title 16, Chapter 1, Section 1-04 (l), referencing NYC Administrative Code §16-119.

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Residents are entitled to a FREE Bulky Item pick-up service for items too large to fit in your bins, such as mattresses, furniture, or appliances.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Items can be placed at the curb no earlier than 12 hours prior to your scheduled collection day and no later than 6:00 AM on your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Items too large to fit in your bins (no specific dimension or weight limits stated beyond this).

illegal_dumping.citation: Los Angeles Municipal Code Sections 66.25 and 66.32; Los Angeles City Administrative Code Section 22.12.1(a)

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Bulk items, such as furniture, mattresses, and appliances, are picked up on your regularly scheduled garbage collection day.

contacts.department_name: City of Houston Solid Waste Management Department

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Furniture, carpet, mattresses, and other household items too large to fit in your green cart.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place your junk waste at the curb no earlier than 6 p.m. on the Friday before your collection week, and no later than 6 a.m. on your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Items too large to fit in your green cart.

drop_off_locations.name: North Main Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Livingston Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Southwest Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: North Shepherd Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Sunnyside Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Cole Creek Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Houston residency required. Accepts household trash, tree waste, and junk waste, including mattresses.

contacts.department_name: City of Phoenix Public Works Department - Solid Waste Services

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Items commonly collected include: furniture, mattresses, appliances (with refrigerants removed), yard waste (cut and bundled).
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place bulk trash at the curb no earlier than eight days prior to your collection week and no later than Sunday evening before collection week.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Bulk trash piles must be no larger than 20 feet long, 6 feet wide and 4 feet high.

drop_off_locations.name: North Gateway Transfer Station
drop_off_locations.address: 30205 N Black Canyon Hwy, Phoenix, AZ 85085
drop_off_locations.notes: Accepts mattresses. Proof of City of Phoenix residency required for free disposal (up to 1,000 lbs per month). Non-residents and commercial customers pay a fee.

drop_off_locations.name: 27th Avenue Transfer Station
drop_off_locations.notes: Accepts mattresses. Proof of City of Phoenix residency required for free disposal (up to 1,000 lbs per month). Non-residents and commercial customers pay a fee.

illegal_dumping.citation: City of Phoenix Code Chapter 27, Article II, Section 27-28 and Chapter 1, Section 1-5

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Mattresses and box springs MUST BE SEALED IN PLASTIC MATTRESS BAGS
curbside_rules.placement_time: By 7:00 AM on collection day, but no earlier than 7:00 PM the evening before
curbside_rules.size_limits: Up to two (2) bulk items per week. Each item must weigh less than 50 pounds.

drop_off_locations.name: West Philadelphia Sanitation Convenience Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Philadelphia residency required. Mattresses accepted.

drop_off_locations.name: Northwest Philadelphia Sanitation Convenience Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Philadelphia residency required. Mattresses accepted.

drop_off_locations.name: Northeast Philadelphia Sanitation Convenience Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Philadelphia residency required. Mattresses accepted.

drop_off_locations.name: Central Philadelphia Sanitation Convenience Center (Strawberry Mansion)
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Philadelphia residency required. Mattresses accepted.

drop_off_locations.name: South Philadelphia Sanitation Convenience Center (Pier 78)
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Philadelphia residency required. Mattresses accepted.

contacts.department_name: San Antonio Solid Waste Management Department

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Mattresses must be wrapped in plastic to be collected at the curb and placed at least 3 feet from other carts.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Items must be curbside by 7 a.m. on your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: No item greater than 8 feet in length or weighing more than 300 pounds.

drop_off_locations.name: Bitters Neighborhood Drop-Off Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of residency required. Accepts bulky items, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Culebra Neighborhood Drop-Off Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of residency required. Accepts bulky items, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Frio City Rd Neighborhood Drop-Off Center
drop_off_locations.address: 1531 Frio City Rd, San Antonio, TX 78226
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of residency required. Accepts bulky items, including mattresses.

drop_off_locations.name: Rigsby Neighborhood Drop-Off Center
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of residency required. Accepts bulky items, including mattresses.

illegal_dumping.citation: City Code Chapter 15, Article III, Division 2, Section 15-45

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Mattresses and box springs must be completely covered with plastic (e.g., mattress bag, tarp or plastic sheeting) to protect collection crews from potential bed bug infestations.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place items curbside by 6:30 a.m. on your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Items must not exceed 8 feet in length or weigh more than 200 pounds.

drop_off_locations.name: Miramar Landfill
drop_off_locations.notes: Fees apply for disposal. Proof of residency may be required for certain services. Accepts mattresses, furniture, and other bulky items.

illegal_dumping.citation: City of San Diego Municipal Code Sections 66.0125 and 66.0127

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Mattresses fall under general bulk waste rules. Items that are heavier than 150 pounds or larger than 8 feet will not be collected by the City of Dallas Bulk & Brush Collection.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Place your bulk waste neatly at the curb by 7:00 a.m. on your collection day. Bulk waste must not be placed out more than seven days prior to your collection day.
curbside_rules.size_limits: All items must be less than 8 feet long and weigh no more than 150 lbs.

drop_off_locations.name: Northwest Transfer Station
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Dallas residency required, accepts mattresses and bulk waste.

drop_off_locations.name: South Central Transfer Station
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Dallas residency required, accepts mattresses and bulk waste.

drop_off_locations.name: Bachman Neighborhood Depository
drop_off_locations.notes: Proof of Dallas residency required, accepts mattresses and bulk waste.

drop_off_locations.name: McCommas Bluff Landfill
drop_off_locations.notes: Fees apply, proof of Dallas residency may be required for residential rates, accepts mattresses and general waste.

illegal_dumping.citation: City of Dallas Sanitation Services: Illegal Dumping (Class C Misdemeanor)
